SourceProxy.name: IsotropicRemeshingFilter
SourceProxy.label: Isotropic Remeshing
SourceProxy.Documentation:
This Filter will remesh the given data sets. It takes a MultipleBlockDataSet (of polydata or unstructured grid ) as input, and returns a MultipleBlockDataSet containing the remeshed inputs as PolyData.
To create a MultiBlockDataSet, select all the meshes you want to remesh and use the Group Datasets filter.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Length
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Target Edge Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The targeted length for the new edges of the mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: MainIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: #Main Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of iterations for the sequence of atomic operations performed (edge splits, edge collapses, edge flips, tangential relaxation and projection to the initial surface to generate a smooth mesh with a prescribed edge length).
